sn1.7:1.2: Standing to one side, a devatā addressed the Blessed One with a verse:
sn1.7:2.2: who may be led by the teachings of others:
sn1.7:2.3: Asleep are they; they haven’t awakened.
sn1.7:2.4: It’s time for them to awaken.”
sn1.7:3.2: may not be led by the teachings of others.
sn1.7:3.4: they go among the discordant harmoniously.””
